introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text:
{consultancy_name} (referred to as Consultant) has been commissioned by {contractor_name} (referred to as Contractor) as National center for environmental compliance (NCEC) approved consultant, to conduct {report_frequency} Environmental Monitoring for {project_name}.
 
This report documents the environmental monitoring carried out on {report_date} and is the {report_number} Weekly Environmental monitoring.

scope_of_work.title: Scope of Work
scope_of_work.text: The scope of work is to perform {report_frequency} environmental monitoring as follows:

monitoring_locations.title: Monitoring Locations
monitoring_locations.text: The monitoring was conducted on {report_date}. Table {table_number} provides location details.

regulatory_standards.title: Regulatory Standards
regulatory_standards.text: Regulatory standards ensure compliance with environmental laws.

regulatory_standard_air_quality.title: Regulatory Standard - Air Quality
regulatory_standard_air_quality.text: Air quality standards as per Royal Decree No. (M/165), Dated 19/11/1441 AH.

legal_framework.title: Legal Framework
legal_framework.text: This regulation is enforced under environmental law article 12.

regulatory_standard_noise.title: Regulatory Standard - Noise
regulatory_standard_noise.text: Noise limits are set to protect public health.

ambient_air_quality_monitoring.title: Ambient Air Quality Monitoring
ambient_air_quality_monitoring.text: Ambient air quality monitoring ensures that air pollution levels remain within safe limits.

objective.title: Objective
objective.text: Key pollutants measured include PM2.5, PM10, NOx, and SO2.

scope.title: Scope
scope.text: Real-time monitoring stations and portable analyzers are used.

instrumentation_and_methodology.title: Instrumentation and Methodology
instrumentation_and_methodology.text: Monitoring is conducted at predefined intervals following regulatory guidelines.

results_and_discussions.title: Results and Discussions
results_and_discussions.text: Collected data is compared against permissible limits to determine compliance.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text: The monitoring results show compliance with environmental standards.

appendices.title: Appendices
appendices.text: Additional information and data records are included in this section.
